CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND ( ApplicationRequestDate__c >= DATE (1868,09,08), ApplicationRequestDate__c <= DATE (1912,07,29)), "M" & IF(YEAR ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) - 1867 < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( YEAR ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) - 1867 ) & IF(MONTH ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( MONTH ( ApplicationRequestDate__c )) & IF(DAY ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( DAY ( ApplicationRequestDate__c )) ,
IF ( AND ( ApplicationRequestDate__c >= DATE (1912,07,30), ApplicationRequestDate__c <= DATE (1926,12,24)), "T" & IF(YEAR ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) - 1911 < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( YEAR ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) - 1911 ) & IF(MONTH ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( MONTH ( ApplicationRequestDate__c )) & IF(DAY ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( DAY ( ApplicationRequestDate__c )) ,
IF ( AND ( ApplicationRequestDate__c >= DATE (1926,12,25), ApplicationRequestDate__c <= DATE (1989,01,07)), "S" & IF(YEAR ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) - 1925 < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( YEAR ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) - 1925 ) & IF(MONTH ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( MONTH ( ApplicationRequestDate__c )) & IF(DAY ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( DAY ( ApplicationRequestDate__c )) ,
IF ( AND ( ApplicationRequestDate__c >= DATE (1989,01,08), ApplicationRequestDate__c <= DATE (2019,04,30)), "H" & IF(YEAR ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) - 1988 < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( YEAR ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) - 1988 ) & IF(MONTH ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( MONTH ( ApplicationRequestDate__c )) & IF(DAY ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( DAY ( ApplicationRequestDate__c )) ,
IF ( ApplicationRequestDate__c >= DATE (2019,05,01),
"R" & IF(YEAR ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) - 2018 < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( YEAR ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) - 2018 ) & IF(MONTH ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( MONTH ( ApplicationRequestDate__c )) & IF(DAY ( ApplicationRequestDate__c ) < 10 ,"0","" ) & TEXT ( DAY ( ApplicationRequestDate__c )) , "#エラー")))))
CustomField.label: 申込（請求）日付（和暦）
